intro.description: Variables can be used to store partial result and do complex calculation with the data extracted from datasource. The values can then be used in various part of the report, including other variables. In this tutorial will be show how to create and configure a variable, explaining every field that define it.

item.title: Go in the outline tab
item.description: With a report opened switch into the outline tab

item.title: Create a variable from the contextual menu
item.description: Right click on the element Variables and select Create variable.
